thread.title: Everything You'd Expect from a Marriott, Plus an Amazing View
thread.title_full: Everything You'd Expect from a Marriott, Plus an Amazing View - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: NJ
title: Everything You'd Expect from a Marriott, Plus an Amazing View
text:
Great business hotel with great meeting rooms, sleeping rooms, food, and service--this is a top-functioning Marriott, for sure. What sets it apart is the view. From the lobby, restaurant, or waterfront rooms, one looks out over the bay at the SFO runway. It is a beautiful vista, but at the same time, watching the jets--including some of the largest long-haul carriers--land and take off is quite a sight in itself!
Room Tip: Absolutely reserve a runway-facing room! See more room tips
